website_summaries.verdict: The diagonal support bars in these quality, powder-coated brackets help them hold up to 1,000 pounds per pair, when mounted into 16-inch stud centers.
pros: Holds up to 1,000 pounds per pair when mounted into 16-inch wall stud centers
Max bracket shelves are intended for heavy-duty shelving projects in places like the utility closet, basement, or garage

customer_reviews.title: SO STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Used these to put up a small worksurface next to the sink. The brackets are just so sturdy, was incredibly happy with the outcome. Not a wobble, not a budge. Sadly, I live in an old building with crumbling plaster and no studs in the bump-out where I needed the workspace. So...the whole thing got wrenched out of the wall after a few weeks, damaging the wall, the floor, the worksurface...and ruining the bread I was kneading. Ha! But the brackets themselves don't have a scratch. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: John Sterling Shelf Bracket
customer_reviews.text: I installed two of these shelf supports in about 20 minutes. Most of the time being spent locating studs and making level lines before installation. I used the shelf supports as templates, lining them up on my level lines, an marked the hole location. I then pre-drilled the drywall/studs and installed three 2 1/2 inch screws into the wall to support each bracket. The upper screw holes are close to the shelf support portions of the angle and it is best if you have a screwdriver that is about 12 inches long. My brackets arrived undamaged and are painted black. The are very strong brackets and I m very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P. Byrne Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for counter top brackets
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to add an inexpensive coffee bar to my kitchen with butcher block from Home Depot. The counter is 24 in deep and the brackets are 20 in deep. The counter is stylish and study.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good brackets
customer_reviews.text: They’re really good. I used them for shelves that extend 2 feet out, and I’ve so far placed at least 60 pounds on the shelf without a problem. I did have trouble figuring out which screws to use to attach the bracket to my shelf (I guess since my shelf was kinda thin, the screw heads would go through the holes), but I ended up using a washer and a small screw and it worked well enough for my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: A Decent Bracket for a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I’m decently happy with my purchase. These brackets seem sturdy and are holding up my 5ft long shelf well. My only issue is that the back of bracket, that either goes against the wall or the shelf was jagged and left scratches on the wall as we were sliding the shelf around the wall to get it in the right position and make it level. The other issue, which could happen with any bracket, is that the support bar that connects the 2 sides to make the triangle shape, is right over the inside holes, making it hard to get those screws in straight if using a drill.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Not square as the reviews mention. I should of listened. There was absolutely no way we could use these brackets for our floating countertop. So now I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Kfitz

customer_reviews.title: Very Strong, Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: These things are super strong and exactly what I needed. My wall couldn't stand up to the 200 pounds that I put on a pair of these, but these are perfectly undamaged from that little experiment.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly sturdy and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Used these to build a small writing desk right on the wall. So sturdy! And the gray metallic wasn't nearly as shiny as I thought it would be. Which was nice. Way more of a matte gray. Very sturdy when drilled into studs.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Really strong and heavy duty brackets. We're using to hold up a 20x44" shelve with a 70lb. TV and definitely handled the job. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Pinotluvr

customer_reviews.title: Not square, finish blemished.
customer_reviews.text: It looks solid and will likely hold the needed load, but the bracket is not square and came with some of the finish chipped off.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for an eight foot 1" thick cedar shelf. Put stereo on there along with quite a few other items. No problem at all. Good brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and heavy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy piece of metal... Needs serious archers to hold it up. This thing weighs more than the shelf it will hold up!
customer_reviews.author: RAM007

customer_reviews.title: Single bracket - nothing else
customer_reviews.text: This product should be sold with appropriate screws and instructions. And there should be two in a package. Who hangs a shelf on a single bracket? Especially a bracket that claims to hold over a thousand pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ann

customer_reviews.title: No surprises here
customer_reviews.text: They arrive exactly as the description depicts. Seem pretty sturdy, the price was better than most, and they look pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: JCW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Bracket
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, no hardware included! Nice sturdy bracket though. It was shipped with no wrapping, loose in a box. All the brackets arrived scratched and some dented. Really?? Pretty lame attempt at shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: It is not 16" long
customer_reviews.text: the description is false. The long side of the bracket is only 14" and half.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Great bracket, but this is for only one bracket.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the John Sterling max bracket for a basement shelf. Not sure why, but I assumed the price was for a pair. After receiving it in just two days and seeing how well made and robust it was, I immediately ordered a second one. Twenty bucks a bracket is a little pricy but these are worth the extra $$.
customer_reviews.author: Moops.2

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy. Used 3 of these in my storage shed for a shelf and they are very durable. I have heavy bins on the shelf and it holds up great.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L

customer_reviews.title: Great brackets
customer_reviews.text: Great brackets, got them holding up a large bar shelf made of heavy, solid redwood
customer_reviews.author: ghepting

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but quality is lacking. One of them i purchased wasnt even straight
customer_reviews.author: ernie arana

customer_reviews.title: Best support bracket in the market !!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a long search to find you!!! Thank you John Sterling for your great product. It did the job PERFECTLY !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D.

customer_reviews.title: CRAP! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived beat up and bent, DO NOT BUY! There was only a 30 day return window which is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Targy

customer_reviews.title: Flawed product
customer_reviews.text: John Sterling THE MAX BRACKET had chips in the paint. Some were not straight either. I would rate these of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: TNJones

customer_reviews.title: Large shelf brackets
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bracket for a large shelf. These brackets worked well. Very sturdy and should hold up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Randy C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT brackets!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so easy to install and work great. Aren't massive, but they are very heavy duty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: NashGatorGirl

customer_reviews.title: Did what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great book shelve bracket. Worked great for building a shelf for my home theater receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: We got 3 to hold up an 8 ft floating bar top! Works like a charm! I would say it has around 100 lbs of weight on it and we did get 3 due to the length
customer_reviews.author: Shanda p.

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a pantry and the are super tough and look great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine Bracket (note that it's only one, not a pair)
customer_reviews.text: Bracket is fine. Only one though, not a pair, which is my bad for missing that. Had to order a second one...
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: however they did look like they had been used and sold for new
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need them after all but will hang on to them for a later project, however they did look like they had been used and sold for new..so I could not give them 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Horrible !!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible packaging !!! Paint chipped all over. I'd love to send them back but the next ones may be even worse.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I imagined it would be. Perfect for mounting shelves above my desk.
customer_reviews.author: surferboy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive junk
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. These only have one spot weld at each join with no penetration. The brace is not cut at a true 45 degree angle so there is a gap at the end of each joint. It advertises 1000 lb. capacity. But even if you had high grade bolts and a metal wall stud stout enough, there is no way the material or craftsmanship could hold that weight. And at $15 PER BRACKET it is a total ripe off! I should have known this is what you get from a China made product. Don't be fooled by the 1000 lb. statement and $15 price. There is nothing in this product that justifies either.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good brackets. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: They were all thrown in a box with little packaging so they had some paint chipped but once installed we hardly noticed. Good brackets. Easy to install. Best price we could find.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered 12 of these brackets. They were all just thrown into a box with no wrapping whatsoever..Each and every one of them has the powder coating chipped off on different places. I plan to put these in a brand new kitchen and they look really bad. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Can not hold 160 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold up had it for a few month it bend, also is already rusting
customer_reviews.author: BeachAir

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but not pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are going to work great for my project, but they are not perfect. The finish is a bit rough and they are not perfectly straight. They are working great so far for my built in counter/work desk in the basement. They seem very sturdy and although I have not tested it, I think a pair could hold (close to?) a 1000 pounds if screwed into studs as stated. I however would not want to use them to hold up a shelf in my living room where they would be seen.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Review

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware...this is not 16 inches
customer_reviews.text: The outside package reads...16 inches but indeed it is not at all! The bracket is either 13 3/4 or 14 1/4 (I don't exactly remember what my husband said after opening the box. Either way it comes no where near the 16 mark that I thought I would receive after placing my order. Apparently that is all anyone will get, I have since read some reviews and I was not the only one surprised. Buyer beware! They will exchange it for free for the exact same item, ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Molz

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy or even as the equivalent from Lowes.
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy or even as the equivalent from Lowes. I ordered 4. 1 of the 4 brackets I was installing was not square with the wall so the shelf wobbled. Also, the metal is not as sturdy as I was looking for. With all 3 screws fastened to a stud (#12 2.5" wood screws) the top of the bracket itself was wobbly before the shelf was installed. Replaced them with brackets from Lowes. Shelf is level and brackets don't wobble. For the weight they say they support I would expect sturdier and of course SQUARE brackets. 2 stars because 3 of the 4 were square to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Mrseche

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy, great price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to support this wooden 18 inch wide counter and was shocked by some of the prices for these type of supports. Install was easy, they look great and the counter is extremely well supported. I do agree that packaging could be better as they are indeed just floating around in the box with a few plastic pouches, but there was no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Vic & Paula

customer_reviews.title: NOT square
customer_reviews.text: There must be no quality control for these. I started to hang them up on the wall only to notice by the 2nd one that even though they were level at the back of the bracket, towards the front they were not. Turns out they are not square so I checked the rest and some were worse then others. Only 1 I would call acceptable out of 4. If I were to lay a shelf on these it would not lay flat across all the brackets. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tamez

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf brackets
customer_reviews.text: I have 7 of these supporting a 24 foot section of 16 inch wide shelf in my workshop. I hung from the shelf after installation with no flex in the brackets. They are anchored into the wall studs with hardened cabinet screws..doing exactly what I needed them to do. I have 5 more yet to install..great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good bracket
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of thinking it was a two pc set, so I had to order another one. The second one had the mounting holes a little bigger and I had to use washers. Overall, sturdy and just what I needed for a 2 ft deep shelf in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Frank ten

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not good condition
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and heavy, so I trust they'll hold some weight. They did arrive pretty scratched up; they almost look used. It won't be a problem for my purposes, but if you were planning on using these as decor, I'd consider looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: steppe22

customer_reviews.title: Strong, but literally thrown in the box without any ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong, but literally thrown in the box without any protective wrapping so they just rattle around in there dinging and damaging each other's finish. Price is right and the finish isn't a big deal, but for those who need perfection, it's going to be tough.
customer_reviews.author: G. G.

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The product was of excellent quality but I ordered 16 inch and got 2 14 inch. Was not very happy as we could have went to Lowe's or Home Depot for 14 inch. Was going to return them but decided to save them for another project.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Mack

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and has 3 holes for screwes on each edge, which gives extra security. Not cheap, but woth it.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love these brackets...I spent a lot of time measuring, etc. as they will hold up a cat perch. They are really heavy duty brackets--great quality.
customer_reviews.author: NightHeron

customer_reviews.title: NOT 16 INCHES
customer_reviews.text: Mine were only 14 3/4 inches. Needed 16 inches to support outer shelf support band
customer_reviews.author: Terry T.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Plain and simple shelf supports that are easy to install and work well. They are quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: NCMom

customer_reviews.title: These Brackets Are The Bomb...
customer_reviews.text: BEST brackets ever! Quality could not be better. Sturdy, carries a ton of weight, and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherlouisa

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty! I needed a 90 degree bracket ...
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty! I needed a 90 degree bracket to attach to a tool to support the weight of a sheet of 1/2" plywood. This bracket worked perfectly. As an added bonus, it is powder coated.
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used it to support my closet rod that was 16 inches from the wall. I could only find 12 and 14 inches locally. So thanks!
customer_reviews.author: jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I hung a marble shelf with these and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving
customer_reviews.text: It was nice to find the longer shelving. Just a little pricey for one.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Marie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 of these to hang a 8ft.X 17.5 in. shelf above garage door. Heavy duty. Easy to hang. Liooks good too. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Zwick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Strong and well packaged, arrived without any sign of damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: There were a few scratches in the paint. Each piece should have some protection around it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen In PA

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Did the trick in stabilizing my 4x4 corner posts to the floor decking where a side tie in was not possible. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: susanjayne007

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super strong and work as intended. Minor damage to finish when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Conklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best thing since sliced bread! It holds up my shelf which has... sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: Deon R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to hang my Midi Keyboard against the wall, perfect very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy duty, but imprecise and warped.
customer_reviews.text: Bracket was solid and sturdy. However, the metal on both edges was warped. Additionally, the two brackets I received were at slightly different angles making a truly level shelf extremely difficult to construct. While I am sure this can hold a lot of weight, if you need a precise L bracket this is not the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruined

customer_reviews.title: Just do it.
customer_reviews.text: Stop second guessing yourself by reading reviews. They're brackets. You're fine.
customer_reviews.author: Someone

product_meta.title: John Sterling THE MAX BRACKET Shelf Bracket, 20-inch, Black, 0049-20BKH
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Size:20-InchTHE MAX BRACKET is a heavy-duty utility shelf bracket that is used in residential, commercial and industrial applications due to its superior strength and durability. Finished with a durable black powder coat finish, this bracket will hold up to 1,000 lbs. per pair when mounted into wall studs on 16-inch stud centers. This 20-inch shelf bracket is designed to support shelves from 20-inches to 24-inches in depth.
feature_bullets: This heavy-duty utility shelf bracket measures 19-1/4-inches deep by 12-1/2-inches tall
Designed to support shelves 20-inches to 24-inches in depth

THE MAX BRACKET shelf brackets are ideal for heavy-duty shelving applications often found in garages, utility closets, basements, storage rooms, supporting counter tops and other work surfaces throughout homes, stores, offices and factories.
Holds up to 1,000 lbs. per pair when mounted into 16-inch wall stud centers

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars308 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
